Structs/Generator.html.name: Generator
Structs/Generator.html.abstract: Generator for parsing an OpenAPI specification and generating a library from it

Structs/Migrator.html.name: Migrator
Structs/Migrator.html.abstract: Responsible for creating the facade of an OpenAPI library according to a migration guide.

Structs/PathHandler.html.name: PathHandler

Enums/MigrationStrategy.html#/s:8Pallido.name: all
Enums/MigrationStrategy.html#/s:8Pallido.abstract: migrates all changes as stated in migration guide - default

Enums/MigrationStrategy.html#/s:8Pallido.name: none
Enums/MigrationStrategy.html#/s:8Pallido.abstract: migrates no change. This is used for the first integration of the client library.
